New Comp/Circular-2010 
                         Restricted  
NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I(Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated: 03 /02/2010 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  05 /2010 
 
 
Subject:   Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by the   
                 General Manager, Gun & Shell Factory. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 626-AA/2009, issued under reference  
No.8/14/2009-IR dated 23.12.2009 regarding authorization to the General 
Manager, Gun & Shell Factory, Cossipore, Kolkata for carriage of arms & 
ammunition, consigned to the licensed dealers and Central / State Govt. 
Departments by air to/from any point within India, is forwarded herewith for 
information and necessary action by all concerned.  
 
2. 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid w.e.f 
01.01.2010 to 31.12.2010.  
 
3. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).  
 
Encl:    As above.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( M.Malaviya, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution as per list attached.
